医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
可穿戴设备和机器学习预测帕金森病患者五年内跌倒的风险可穿戴传感器数据与机器学习相结合，可以预测帕金森病患者的跌倒风险，从而在五年内增强预防保健和临床结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Wearables-and-machine-learning-predict- Five-year-fall-risk-in-Parkinsone28099s-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Wearables-and-machine-learning-predict- Five-year-fall-risk-in-Parkinsone28099s-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=320cf756-4156-41f5-a656-65ba1f8a01b4 Tue, 10 Dec 2024 12:28:00 -0500 Wearables and machine learning predict five-year fall risk in Parkinson’s patients
酒精和物质使用导致电动滑板车和电动自行车伤害上升《伤害预防》杂志在线发表的一项全国范围内急诊科就诊分析发现，自 2019 年以来，在酒精和药物滥用的推动下，美国电动滑板车和电动自行车受伤人数增加了两倍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Alcohol-and-substance-use-contribute-to-rising-e-scooter-and-e-bike-injuries.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Alcohol-and-substance-use-contribute-to-rising-e-scooter-and-e-bike-injuries.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c47ffcaf-b5ad-45ca-b1e7-97160b6c9a8e Tue, 10 Dec 2024 12:18:29 -0500 Alcohol and substance use contribute to rising e-scooter and e-bike injuries
研究揭示弓形虫寄生虫如何逃避药物治疗印第安纳大学医学院研究人员的一项研究为弓形虫寄生虫如何制造进入休眠阶段所需的蛋白质提供了新的线索，从而使它们能够逃避药物治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Study-unveils-how-Toxoplasma-gondii-parasites-escape-drug-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Study-unveils-how-Toxoplasma-gondii-parasites-escape-drug-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1cf4633c-8201-4e79-b9d2-65b954d64a7a Tue, 10 Dec 2024 12:09:22 -0500 Study unveils how Toxoplasma gondii parasites escape drug treatment
研究发现青少年游戏成瘾的关键大脑标志物玩电子游戏对许多青少年来说是一种成人仪式，但对某些人来说，这也可能是游戏成瘾的第一步。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Study-finds-key-brain-markers-for-gaming-addiction-in-adolescents.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Study-finds-key-brain-markers-for-gaming-addiction-in-adolescents.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f50e422f-89a7-4150-9dc7-94ebbe2be0af Tue, 10 Dec 2024 12:04:21 -0500 Study finds key brain markers for gaming addiction in adolescents
确定了两种不同类型的脂肪肝卡罗林斯卡学院和哥德堡大学的研究人员发现了两种类型的代谢相关脂肪肝病——肝脏特异性类型和影响其他器官和组织的全身类型。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Two-distinct-types-of-fatty-liver-disease-identified.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Two-distinct-types-of-fatty-liver-disease-identified.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c4537053-66ab-4a29-919b-89c08d245c28 Tue, 10 Dec 2024 11:31:00 -0500 Two distinct types of fatty liver disease identified
心理治疗报告中的差距可能会阻碍迷幻治疗的有效性迷幻辅助心理治疗作为治疗传统治疗效果不佳的精神障碍患者的一种有前途的方法而受到关注。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Gaps-in-reporting-psychotherapy-may-hinder-effectness-of-psychedelic-treatments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Gaps-in-reporting-psychotherapy-may-hinder-effectness-of-psychedelic-treatments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e656a00f-d332-4e40-a155-9826b3148c51 Tue, 10 Dec 2024 11:25:11 -0500 Gaps in reporting psychotherapy may hinder effectiveness of psychedelic treatments
智能牙刷改善老年人口腔健康和生活质量牙医约翰·弗莱博格 (Johan Flyborg) 看到许多老年患者的口腔健康状况急剧恶化后，开始寻找解决方案。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Intelligent-toothbrush-improves-oral-health-and-quality-of-life-of-older-people.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Intelligent-toothbrush-improves-oral-health-and-quality-of-life-of-older-people.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c1da4121-d49f-4404-b050-6df4209475ed Tue, 10 Dec 2024 07:50:24 -0500 Intelligent toothbrush improves oral health and quality of life of older people
研究发现，患有多囊卵巢综合症和肥胖症的女性生下的孩子较小挪威科技大学 (NTNU) 最近进行的一项研究表明，患有多囊卵巢综合症 (PCOS) 和肥胖症的女性生出出生体重、身长和头围较小婴儿的风险更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Women-with-PCOS-and-obesity-have-smaller-babies-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Women-with-PCOS-and-obesity-have-smaller-babies-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=de02c97f-07e5-401e-8f8e-ded2c4559b33 Tue, 10 Dec 2024 07:46:44 -0500 Women with PCOS and obesity have smaller babies, study finds
肥胖患者在减肥手术后无需阿片类药物即可控制疼痛根据瑞典哥德堡大学的一篇论文，接受减肥手术的肥胖患者可以在不使用阿片类药物的情况下进行治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Obese-病人-can-manage-pain-without-opioids-after-bariatric-surgery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Obese-病人-can-manage-pain-without-opioids-after-bariatric-surgery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a83ce84f-be15-462f-b638-123ffabc1f38 Tue, 10 Dec 2024 07:43:00 -0500 Obese patients can manage pain without opioids after bariatric surgery
有前途的基因疗法可能会改变心力衰竭的治疗一种新的基因疗法可以在大型动物模型中逆转心力衰竭的影响并恢复心脏功能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Promising-gene-therapy-could-transform-heart-failure-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Promising-gene-therapy-could-transform-heart-failure-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a7e240a7-cb79-486b-a919-c9c869312ecc Tue, 10 Dec 2024 06:53:00 -0500 Promising gene therapy could transform heart failure treatment
